quest.name: Way of the Gladiator
journal: Lulutsu wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Gladiators' Guild.
Lulutsu has bid you speak with First Sword Mylla, whose approval you must obtain if you wish to join the guild.
Satisfied that you have the strength to live by the sword, the guildmaster furnishes you with a weathered weapon. Equip the blade and speak to her once more to begin your training.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: What will it be? Will you rise above the masses and inscribe your name in legend, or will you resign yourself to mediocrity and die in obscurity?

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Oh, so it's to be death in obscurity...

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Well, should you come to your senses, you may speak with me at any time to proceed with the enrollment process.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: A decision you shan't regret. One moment─make way for Forename Surname! Fresh meat coming through!

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Now then, before your enrollment can be considered complete, you must present yourself to First Sword Mylla. Seek her out and obtain her approval.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Aye, I heard Lulutsu. So you're Forename Surname. 'Tis a good, strong name.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: On behalf of the Gladiators' Guild, allow me to welcome you. I am Mylla, guildmaster here.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: So you wish to study our arts. I presume you have your reasons for choosing the sword over all other weapons. Perhaps you think it easiest to learn.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: A sword is a simple weapon. But to wield a blade well is anything but simple.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: For every Coliseum champion to emerge from our ranks, there have been countless disappointments who failed to achieve greatness.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Bear that in mind before you answer me, Forename, for I do not ask this question lightly: have you the strength to live by the sword and─if it be your fate─die by it?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Have you the strength to live by the sword?

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Then perhaps your path lies elsewhere. Should it lead you back to us someday, we can discuss your future once more.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Then welcome, gladiator, to your new home!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Take this sword. There are many like it, but this one is yours now.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Consider it a gift if you like. Now wear it on your hip as I do, and show me you are ready to begin your training!

obj.n: So You Want to Be a Gladiator
